dict.acceptation: 光，光明；发光体；日光，黎明；<诗>视力，眼神；
使发光；点燃；使容光焕发；

sent.orig: You may wish to insert a Clamp node between the Light and the Material nodes.
sent.trans: 技巧：你也许希望去插入一个CLAMP节点，在材质节点和LIGHT节点之间。

sent.orig: Procuct: downlight spot light, halogen light source light, kichen light etc. series.
sent.trans: 目前产品有：筒灯，射灯，金卤灯。节能灯。吸顶灯等系列。

sent.orig: Procuct: downlight spot light, halogen light source light, kitchen light etc. series.
sent.trans: 目前产品有：筒灯，射灯，金卤灯。节能灯。吸顶灯。厨卫灯等系列。

sent.orig: Indirect light is bounced light that reflects from object when it is affected by direct light.
sent.trans: 间接光是直射光照射到物体上被反射出来的光线。

sent.orig: The light from the sun is incoherent light, so is the light from incandescent bulb.
sent.trans: 太阳光的非相干光，白炽灯光也是非相干光。
